option_text_bm: Al-Quran dihafal dan ditulis di pelbagai medium seperti kulit dan batu.
option_text_en: The Quran was memorized and written on various materials like leather and stone.

option_text_bm: Khalifah Abu Bakar As-Siddiq mengarahkan pengumpulan ayat-ayat Al-Quran selepas Perang Yamamah.
option_text_en: Caliph Abu Bakr As-Siddiq ordered the collection of Quranic verses after the Battle of Yamamah.

option_text_bm: Khalifah Uthman bin Affan menyalin dan menyebarkan satu mushaf rasmi ke seluruh wilayah Islam.
option_text_en: Caliph Uthman bin Affan copied and distributed an official Mushaf across Islamic regions.

option_text_bm: Hari ini, Al-Quran dicetak dan disebarkan dalam pelbagai bahasa di seluruh dunia.
option_text_en: Today, the Quran is printed and distributed in various languages worldwide.
